title: Carmel: storyteller
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: Learning to live with early onset memory loss
description: Carmel is a retired school teacher, wife, mother and grandmother. Her family' s life dramatically changed when she was diagnosed with early onset memory loss. With her husband, she tells their story and looks positively in the face of an unknown future. Created as part of the 'Memory's Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage' workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer's Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth.
